name: slicesdir
author: FMRIB Centre, University of Oxford
description: slicesdir generates a directory containing orthogonal slices through a set of images.

inputs.description: List of image files to process
inputs.name: File List

inputs.description: Filelist contains pairs of images (underlying and red-outline images)
inputs.name: Pairs of Images Flag

inputs.description: Use the specified image as the red-outline image on top of all images in the file list
inputs.name: Red-outline Image

inputs.description: Use specified threshold for edges. If >0, use this proportion of max-min; if <0, use the absolute value
inputs.name: Edge Threshold

inputs.description: Output every second axial slice instead of 9 ortho slices
inputs.name: Second Axial Slice Option
